full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice Contract SAS - IPF Elevator Modernization

## Project Overview and Background

The National Research Council Canada is seeking a contractor to modernize the existing elevator in the IPF building, located at 110 Gymnasium Place, Saskatoon, SK.

## Contract Details

* Contract Title: SAS - IPF Elevator Modernization
* Contract Reference Number: PW-23-01030114
* Solicitation Number: 22-58148
* Publication Date: March 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 28, 2023, 16:00 (ET)
* Amendment Number: 6
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Tender Information

* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Category: Construction (other buildings)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

* Mandatory Site Visit: All bidders must attend a site visit on March 28 or 29, 2023.
* Security Clearance: Bidders must have their personnel undergo security screening to "Reliability" status level.
* WSFS Saskatchewan Certificate: Bidders must provide a valid WORKSAFE Saskatchewan certificate with their tender.

## Contract Administration and Dispute Resolution

* Dispute Resolution: The contract is subject to the jurisdiction of the Procurement Ombudsman.
* Security Clearance Requirements
The bidder's personnel must be security cleared according to the Canadian Security Clearance policy.

## Notice and Specifications

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Open bidding
* Notice URL: None
* Attachment: Various documents are attached to this notice, including addenda and tender packages (English and French).

## Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Collin Long, collin.long@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Departmental Representative: Jazmin McLean, jazmin.mclean@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
* Office Address: 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R6

Please note that the rewritten text only includes necessary information and excludes details that are not essential to the notice.
